thread.section_title: Hampton Inn & Suites San Francisco-Burlingame-Airport South - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Loved the laundry
thread.title_full: Loved the laundry - Review of Hampton Inn & Suites San Francisco-Burlingame-Airport South, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Nancy882
title: Loved the laundry
text: Thrilled to see a washing machine (75 cents) after two weeks abroad. The room was greqt,. The staff was helpful and there is a great restaurant (New England Chowder) five minutes walk away.. Ii am sorry that we will miss breakfast because of an early flight. For the price, it is great (not fancy) but i would be happy to stay again.
